00005 #ifndef NATIVE_CLIENT_TESTS_PEPPER_PLUGIN_MD5_H_
00006 #define NATIVE_CLIENT_TESTS_PEPPER_PLUGIN_MD5_H_
00007 
00008 #include <string>
00009 
00010 // MD5 stands for Message Digest algorithm 5.
00011 // MD5 is a robust hash function, designed for cyptography, but often used
00012 // for file checksums.  The code is complex and slow, but has few
00013 // collisions.
00014 // See Also:
00015 //   http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MD5
00016 
00017 // These functions perform MD5 operations. The simplest call is MD5Sum() to
00018 // generate the MD5 sum of the given data.
00019 //
00020 // You can also compute the MD5 sum of data incrementally by making multiple
00021 // calls to MD5Update():
00022 //   MD5Context ctx; // intermediate MD5 data: do not use
00023 //   MD5Init(&ctx);
00024 //   MD5Update(&ctx, data1, length1);
00025 //   MD5Update(&ctx, data2, length2);
00026 //   ...
00027 //
00028 //   MD5Digest digest; // the result of the computation
00029 //   MD5Final(&digest, &ctx);
00030 //
00031 // You can call MD5DigestToBase16() to generate a string of the digest.
00032 
00033 // The output of an MD5 operation
00034 typedef struct MD5Digest_struct {
00035   unsigned char a[16];
00036 } MD5Digest;
00037 
00038 // Used for storing intermediate data during an MD5 computation. Callers
00039 // should not access the data.
00040 typedef char MD5Context[88];
00041 
00042 // Computes the MD5 sum of the given data buffer with the given length.
00043 // The given 'digest' structure will be filled with the result data.
00044 void MD5Sum(const void* data, size_t length, MD5Digest* digest);
00045 
00046 // Initializes the given MD5 context structure for subsequent calls to
00047 // MD5Update().
00048 void MD5Init(MD5Context* context);
00049 
00050 // For the given buffer of data, updates the given MD5 context with the sum of
00051 // the data. You can call this any number of times during the computation,
00052 // except that MD5Init() must have been called first.
00053 void MD5Update(MD5Context* context, const void* buf, size_t len);
00054 
00055 // Finalizes the MD5 operation and fills the buffer with the digest.
00056 void MD5Final(MD5Digest* digest, MD5Context* pCtx);
00057 
00058 // Converts a digest into human-readable hexadecimal.
00059 std::string MD5DigestToBase16(const MD5Digest& digest);
00060 
00061 // Returns the MD5 (in hexadecimal) of a string.
00062 std::string MD5String(const std::string& str);
00063 
00064 #endif  // NATIVE_CLIENT_TESTS_PEPPER_PLUGIN_MD5_H_
00065
